hypothesis_content.title: MSTR Extreme Daily Reversion vs. BTC in Stress Regimes
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes, when MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock price deviates by more than 8% from Bitcoin's daily percentage move (adjusted for beta), it will revert at least 50% of the deviation within 2 trading days with 70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR acts as a leveraged Bitcoin proxy. During stress periods, liquidity gaps and forced selling can create temporary dislocations between MSTR and BTC. Market makers and arbitrageurs quickly correct extreme mispricings once panic subsides.
entry_conditions: Regime == STRESS (VIX > 30 or crypto volatility spike)
Deviation occurs on above-average volume (> 1.5× 20-day avg)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 50% of the initial deviation is corrected

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Fewer than 60% of deviations correct by at least 50% within 2 days OR the average holding period return is negative after transaction costs across 30+ stress events.
